com.hazelcast.spi

Interface OperationFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSerializable, IdentifiedDataSerializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMapOperationFactory, AddIndexOperationFactory, BinaryOperationFactory, CacheAssignAndGetUuidsOperationFactory, CacheClearOperationFactory, CacheGetAllOperationFactory, CacheLoadAllOperationFactory, CacheMergeOperationFactory, CacheRemoveAllOperationFactory, CacheSizeOperationFactory, ClearOperationFactory, ClearOperationFactory, ContainsValueOperationFactory, EvictAllOperationFactory, GetAllScheduledOnPartitionOperationFactory, GetResultOperationFactory, IsEmptyOperationFactory, IsPartitionLoadedOperationFactory, KeyLoadStatusOperationFactory, MadePublishableOperationFactory, MapAssignAndGetUuidsOperationFactory, MapFlushOperationFactory, MapGetAllOperationFactory, MapLoadAllOperationFactory, MergeOperationFactory, MergeOperationFactory, MultiMapOperationFactory, MultipleEntryOperationFactory, OperationFactoryWrapper, PartitionAwareOperationFactory, PartitionWideEntryOperationFactory, PartitionWideEntryWithPredicateOperationFactory, PutAllOperationFactory, PutAllPartitionAwareOperationFactory, SizeOperationFactory

    public interface OperationFactory
extends IdentifiedDataSerializable
    A Factory for creating Operation instances.

    The operations that will be sent to all partitions causes redundant serialization and network overhead. An OperationFactory instance is sent to each Member (node) instead to improve the performance. OperationService uses this factory to create Operations for each partition by calling createOperation()
